name: Distinguished
description:
Distinguished is a VR WW2 demo/prototype-ish game type thing that I am making for fun.

You are a Mortar Operator in the 101st Airborne stationed on the outskirts of Bastogne during the German counter offensive.
Provide support to the front line troops as quick as possible. Dial in your coordinates and Fire!

This is the most finished of the two current levels but is still a work in progress.



Play as a British B-17 Waist Gunner over the fields of Holland on a special mission. Fend off waves of Messerschmidt’s as you operate both M2HB .50 cal waist guns.

This level is still in very early development. You can see some of the early progress below.



This very early game performance test can be downloaded below. The mortar level is the only level included as it is the furthest along. You will need a VR headset, HTC Vive to play. I do not have a Rift to test so there is no build for that yet. If you have any issues/bugs please send and email to rparisi {@} implayinggames {dot} com with a detailed description/screenshots of your issue.

Thanks for testing, if you like this game demo/prototype thing, feel free to show your support by donating through Itch.io so I can continue to develop projects like this. 

Follow me to get updated information when the early demo is released.
